name: CARMA: Countries emisions
query: select id, l.name, plant_count, carbonp, carbonpr, carbonf, energyp, energypr, energyf, intensityp, intensitypr, intensityf, fossilp, fossilpr, fossilf, nuclearp, nuclearpr, nuclearf, hydrop, hydropr, hydrof, renewablep, renewablepr, renewablef, iso, s.the_geom_webmercator from carma_countries l inner join countries s on l.iso=s.iso_a3

name: Aqueduct: country flood risk data projections
CAIT: CO2 emissions by country
query: select total_co_excluding_land_use_change_and_forestry_mtco, year, iso, s.the_geom_webmercator from cait_2_0_country_co2_emissions l inner join countries s on l.iso=s.iso_a3

name: CAIT: GHG emissions by country
query: select country, year, total_ghg_wout_lucf, total_ghg_lucf, total_co2_wout_lucf, total_ch4, total_n2o, total_f_gas, energy, industrial_proceses, agriculture, waste, lucf, bunker_fuels, electricity_heat_ratio, manufacturing_construction_ratio, transportation, other_fuel_combustion, fugitive_emissions, iso, s.the_geom_webmercator from cait_2_0_country_ghg_emissions l inner join countries s on l.iso=s.iso_a3

name: CAIT: socioeconomic data
query: select energy_use_thous_tonnes_oil_eq_ktoe, gdp_usd_million_us_2005, population_people, year, iso, s.the_geom_webmercator from cait_2_0_country_socio_economic_data l inner join countries s on l.iso=s.iso_a3

name: CAIT: CO2 emissions by subsector
query: select electricity_heat_mtco, fugitive_emissions_mtco, manufacturing_construction_mtco, other_fuel_combustion_mtco, transportation_mtco, year, iso, s.the_geom_webmercator from cait_2_0_country_co2_emissions_energy_sub_sect l inner join countries s on l.iso=s.iso_a3
